title: Handle an Intoxicated Guest
description: An usher reports a guest who appears heavily intoxicated and is bothering other patrons.

tasks.description: Dispatch a security supervisor and a guest services manager to the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends both security and guest services management to assess the situation.

tasks.description: The on-site team assesses the guest and determines they need to be ejected.
tasks.expected_outcome: The decision is made to remove the guest.

tasks.description: Log the incident, including the decision to eject the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed incident report.

tasks.description: Arrange for safe transportation for the guest, such as calling a taxi or ride-sharing service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Security ensures the guest has a safe way to leave the property.
